After updating vrx to the latest code, the 3d lidar is no longer works as expected. See image below to see the flat wall on gazebo appear curved and distorted on rviz.

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/4093808602-image.png)
‌

After downgrading to update 1722 using `hg up 1722` This fixed the issue. See image below:

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1568678626-image.png)
It appears the implementation of the ocean reflections in ~~#122~~ causes this issue.
